gcci.text: The $3.18/hr H100 pricing reflects severe supply chain bottlenecks and limited chip availability, with capex requirements exceeding $100K per training cluster, forcing smaller players out of the market.

gtpi.text: At $1.25/1M input tokens, DeepSeek's aggressive pricing strategy is triggering an API price war while delivering 15-20% efficiency gains through architectural optimizations, pressuring competitors to match or exit.

gagl.text: The 120 TWh annual energy load represents a 400% surge in AI data center consumption, straining power grids and demanding immediate nuclear capacity expansion to maintain carbon reduction targets.

aipi.text: Industry sentiment shows cautious optimism amid bubble concerns, with sustainable growth hingering on balancing infrastructure investment, operational efficiency, and responsible AI deployment practices.
